Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one line of an incised inscription - Coptic, from the rim of a vessel.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394066) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394066)
